channel.title: Riot-X where developers get paid
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.fontspace.com/preview/m/e82e98c863ac962acd6eea94cec966be.png[/img][/center] [center]hello there evreyone let me introduce myself my name is theowned. not in real life my real name is dennis i am 13 years old and i am busy whit a project. to blow the rsps new life in the server is called Riot-X i only need a great team to join whit me whe also need somebody who makes banner for us and some signatures :) the server is based on a delta server and the client an bluurs client why? becaese whe can do much more whit it :D [size=18pt]pro coders are getting paid!![/size][/center] [center][size=18pt] the prgress list[/size][/center]
adding 622 charachter models - done (ty to dutchboy) adding 633 items and objects - started making home cool :D - almost done adding 508 maps - not started adding full godwars - not started making camelot party room the shops making a splash screen - done (ty to dutchboy) adding summoning - not stated adding new skill tabs - not started adding XP toggle- not started adding run toggle - not started adding quick prayer - not started
[center][size=18pt]what whe need[/size][/center] [center]sourche coders 0/2 client coders 0/2 banner and signature maker 0/1 testers 0/5[/center] [center][size=18pt] what to do if you wanna join[/size] [size=18pt]fill this in[/size][/center]
why you want to join Riot-X: any past expirience?: what you can do for the upcoming server: something extra you want to say:
some pictures: [IMG]http://i858.photobucket.com/albums/ab142/owndknightscape/firstone.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i858.photobucket.com/albums/ab142/owndknightscape/secondone.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i858.photobucket.com/albums/ab142/owndknightscape/thirdone.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i858.photobucket.com/albums/ab142/owndknightscape/turkeyone.jpg[/img] [center][size=18pt] hopely see you later in Riot-X[/size][/center] my msn : dennissnijder@live.nl theowned

item.title: Riot-X where developers get paid
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Very well ,

adding 622 charachter models - done (ty to dutchboy) - please make sure this does not affect dialogues
adding 633 items and objects - started - check for glitches such as firecape models and such
making home cool - almost done - good hope to see something original
adding 508 maps - not started - in my opinion 508 maps are bugged like crazy and not worth the hassle.
adding full godwars - not started - always a plus
making camelot party room the shops - sounds good gives it an older server feeling
making a splash screen - done (ty to dutchboy)- nice nice
adding summoning - not stated - there is a good tut for a base on here
adding new skill tabs - not started- nice to hear even though personally i prefer older ones
adding XP toggle- not started - selection is good
adding run toggle - not started- make it actually work:p
adding quick prayer - not started- personally, too modern.

Read full topic

item.title: Riot-X where developers get paid
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

If you plan on posting, it should either be for applying or providing constructive critisism, not to start a quote pyramid. Please donâ€™t do it in future. Cleans all spam posts
